column5: I cant find sizes 1, 2, or 3.  I have plenty of sizes 4 and 5 for salmon but would like smaller sizes for other species of fish and for trolling for bows.  Anyone know of a shop in the GTA that has those sizes?  OR if you have any you dont want and are willing to sell, please let me know.  The only site i found online that sells them is the Lyman site itself, but the shipping costs are really high.  any help would be great thanx!
